Control.ttp: frThis page provides information related to Security Settings.
frThe username used for logging into the PAC.
frWhen checked, indicates no password is required for this user to login to the PAC.
frThe password used for logging into the PAC.
frThe password used for logging into the PAC. (Must match the password entered above.)
frWhen checkmarked, indicates that this user is currently enabled.
frDate and time this user was first added to the database.
frDate and time of the last modifications made to this user.
frLevel of access granted to this user.
frClick to display online help related to this page...
frClick to begin adding a new user...
frClick to indicate the selected user should be removed...
frClick to save the current user information to the database...
frClick to refresh the contents of this page...
frClick to collapse all the groups in the grid...
frClick to expand all the groups in the grid...
frThe username used for logging into the PAC
frIndicates the level of access granted to this user.
frThe date and time the user was added to the database.
frThe date and time of the last modification.
frIndicates whether the user is currently enabled or not.
frThe date and time the user last accessed the database via the corresponding IP Address.
frThe IP Address(es) the user accessed the database from.

Messages.Message: frPassword must be at least {0} characters in length.
frNew Password and Confirm Password must match.
frUsername must be at least {0} characters in length.
